seo.title: HK Precision - Precision Mechanical Technology | Plastic Molds & CNC Machining
seo.description: HK Precision Mechanical Technology specializes in manufacturing plastic molds, aluminum molds, stamping dies, fixtures, and inspection jigs with high precision. HITACHI, OKUMA CNC machining, Charmilles EDM. Manufacturing high-quality industrial, medical, and household plastic components in Vietnam.

about.title: HK Precision Mechanical Technology
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner in precision mechanical machining
about.description: HK Precision was established in 2015, specializing in manufacturing plastic molds, aluminum molds, stamping dies, and precision mechanical products. With a team of experienced engineers and modern equipment, we are committed to delivering high-quality products to our customers.
about.seoDescription: Learn about HK Precision Company - a leading unit in the field of mold manufacturing and precision mechanical machining with modern technology and professional team.
about.ogDescription: HK Company specializes in mold manufacturing and mechanical machining according to standards with modern technology.
about.orientationContent: The company aims to become a pioneer in the field of production, plastic molds, continuously innovating, improving product/service quality and building sustainable value for customers, community and staff.
about.goalsContent1: To become the leading enterprise in high precision mechanical machining in Vietnam. Expand export market to foreign countries.
about.goalsContent2: Invest in modern machinery and equipment systems, improve product and service quality. Build a professional, creative and dedicated team to customers.
about.companyIntroContent: HK Company is a leading unit in the field of mold manufacturing and mechanical machining according to standards. We specialize in manufacturing household items, mechanical products, components, spare parts for automotive, motorbike industries...
about.modernTechDescription: Using advanced CNC machines and Charmilles EDM systems.
about.precisionEquipmentDescription: Sumitomo injection molding machines, Zeiss CMM inspection equipment ensuring high precision.
about.internationalStandardsDescription: Meeting FUTABA, DME, HASCO standards - ensuring the best product quality.

seo.title: Privacy Policy - HK Precision
seo.description: HK Precision's customer information privacy policy. Commitment to protecting personal information and customer privacy.
seo.ogDescription: Learn about HK Precision's privacy policy and commitment to protecting customer information

generalInfo.title: General Information
generalInfo.content: Welcome to our Privacy Policy page! When you use our website services, you trust us with your information. This Privacy Policy is meant to help you understand what data we collect, why we collect it, and what we do with that data. When you share information with us, we can provide better services for you. This is important; we hope you will take the time to read it carefully.

dataAccess.title: Data access, editing and deletion rights
dataAccess.content: Our customers have the right to access, edit and delete personal data related to them, and object to the processing of that data, by submitting a written request at any time. The Company makes every effort to apply appropriate preventive measures to protect the security and privacy of personal data, and prevent alteration, damage, destruction or unauthorized access by third parties. However, the Company cannot control all risks related to Internet use, and therefore warns website users about potential risks related to Internet activities and use.

dataManagement.title: Personal data management
dataManagement.content: You can view or edit your personal data online for many of our services. You can also make choices about our data collection and use. How you can access or control your personal data will depend on which services you use. You can choose whether you want to receive promotional information from our website via email, SMS, mail and phone.

dataCollection.title: Information we collect
dataCollection.content: Our store collects data to operate effectively and provide you with the best experiences with our services. You provide some of this data directly, such as when you create a personal account. We get some by recording how you interact with our services by, for example, using technologies like cookies and receiving error reports or usage data from software running on your device.

dataUsage.title: How we use your information
dataUsage.content: Our website uses the data we collect for three basic purposes: operating our business and providing (including improving and personalizing) the services we offer, sending communications, including promotional communications, and displaying advertising. In fulfilling these purposes, we combine data we collect from the various website services you use to give you a more seamless, consistent and personalized experience.

dataSharing.title: Sharing your information
dataSharing.content: We share your personal data with your consent or as necessary to complete any transaction or provide any service you have requested or authorized. We also share personal data between our controlled affiliates and subsidiaries. We also share personal data with vendors or agents working on our behalf for the purposes described in this statement.
